body:
$SPY $AAPL   
 
weekly SPY at sneaky future flat cloud bottom equilibirum level.  it was formed 26 weeks of candle aveage plotted ahead 26 weeks and is support and resistance..   
 
thick ichimoku  cloud = thick support.. cloud is formed from price averages from the candles themselves  
 
 bears must watch for breaking red line ( 9 week average line,)  and white line ( 26 week average of price)..  
 
a sneaky ride up the orange cloud top resistance  not out of question to burn time and then gets  closer to the thin cloud support.. just an option to watch..

$SPY $AAPL   daily SPY. a sneaky pattern to watch.  
 
a retest of the ichimoku cloud armpit normal ( where it twisted bearish) still hasnt been fully tested.. this could be sneaky sneaky level to watch!

$SPY $AAPL $QQQ  
 
daily .  
huge action at close Friday.. Fritos flying everywhere . look how price tested old flat cloud equilibirum levels..   at strong level here for bearish wave riders,. a fast bounce up to retest resistance normal

$SPY $AAPL     
 
Weekly #QQQ back to flat cloud bottom equilibirum support. massive Calls and Darkpool buying end of Friday. on watch... import level on weekly red line, white line, cloud top resistance  must be broken to ride orange cloud top resistance  higher

$SPY  
 looking at option darkpool flow..     i see a lot of things that lead to huge buying at end of day . $ a billion after market buying in Darkpool Friday. after they  they sold a Billion Thursday at market close.   
 
.  this could be the level they wanted to reload.  important levels..  following money clues and Options..  will see. 
 
i noticed huge China #KWEB Puts during week, and they loaded huge #KWEB calls Friday.. $BABA #BIDU etc are in this ETF.  watch for China bounce..  
 
$AAPL

links.title: Shanghai hopes COVID tide turning, with fewer cases outside quarantine areas
links.description: Reuters 3 days ago By Brenda Goh and Ella Cao By Brenda Goh and Ella Cao SHANGHAI (Reuters) -China's commercial capital of Shanghai reported no new COVID-19 infections outside quarantine areas in two districts on Wednesday, fanning hopes that the tide is turning in its pandemic battle, as some factories began to return to work.
